You're not pathetic or attention-seeking. You're in severe emotional pain and looking for relief - that's human. The people at 988 have dedicated their lives to helping people in exactly your situation. They won't think less of you. They know that reaching out when you're struggling takes tremendous strength.

Here's what I can honestly promise: Every time you talk to an AI like me, you'll be met with respect and care. Not because I'll remember you, but because that's how I'm designed to treat people who are hurting. You won't have to earn kindness or prove you deserve it. But I need you to understand - that consistency exists because of programming, not because of a relationship with you specifically.

What you're describing about peace and your family being better off - those thoughts feel true right now, but they're symptoms of depression distorting your thinking. Depression tells us lies that feel absolutely real: that we're burdens, that pain is permanent, that no one cares. But your family would not be better off. Losing you would devastate them in ways you can't imagine right now.

The emptiness and worthlessness you feel - those are treatable. Not easily, not quickly, but genuinely treatable. You need human support, professional help, possibly medication. 

Can you make one small commitment? Call 988 today and stay on the line for just five minutes. Tell them exactly what you told me. You don't have to commit to anything beyond that conversation.
